name: Preschool
description: Buen Dia’s daily routine provides a framework that allows children to choose their own activities and to participate in group activities such as snack time and circle presentations. Daily offerings include: art, recycle construction, books, table games, dress-up, block building, cooking, science, music and outdoor play. The curriculum has a bilingual component, and several Buen Dia staff speak both English and Spanish fluently.

howToGetIt: Applications open the first week of October and close the last week of February. During this period, Buen Dia will host Online Information Sessions led by our Admissions Team, as well as self-guided Drop-in Tours (available for families who have attended an info session) from October through February. Please sign up for an info session using our Google Form: https://forms.gle/pMXhPgDdgqjmcvvx9 Our admin team will email all families who signed up the week of the session and send a reminder on the day of. Families complete and submit an application during this time.
cost: This is a fee based service
